info.+content: With the Stone Wars over, the former members of Tsukasa's Empire of Might join forces with the Kingdom of Science to build a ship capable of sailing across open ocean to seek answers on the mystery of the global petrification. However, before they can begin their voyage Senku and his friends need to find some key resources and push some new scientific advancements to build the type of vessel they need.
アニメ「Ｄｒ．ＳＴＯＮＥ(ドクターストーン)」公式HP

title.+content: Ray of Despair, Ray of Hope
The Trump Card Aboard the Science Vessel
